about_the_game:
There is no hope. You were left to die.


In HELL UNDER ICE, you and your crew of up to 4 players are tasked with various assignments across different derelict stations spread out throughout the abandoned moon of Europa.

The year is 2265, and you have awaken from cryogenic slumber. The station you're in is eerily quiet, only being partially maintained by robots running routine schedules.

Players are forced to complete daily tasks assigned by the automated systems. These tasks are your only way to earn credits for essential survival resources and equipment.

FEATURES


  • A four player coop horror experience, where no two playthroughs are the same;
  • Gameplay with nonlinear progression and exploration across several different stations;
  • An oppressive atmosphere, with attention to visual detail and immersive sound design;
  • Fight or flight against multiple otherworldly creatures generated by the Black Hole.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has several depictions of violence, mutilation and gore, although not in realistic fashion. It is expected that at some point players will die to environmental hazards/enemies.

short_description: HELL UNDER ICE is a coop horror game where you and your crew are abandoned on Europa, with the only goal of fulfilling the tasks you are assigned by the DSOA. Explore derelict stations to discover what happened, collect everything you can and fight to stay alive against nightmarish entities.
